name: Zealot
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

otherNightReminder: The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the 'Mad' reminder and the second with the '2nd' reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked 'Mad'. Show the 'This Character Selected You' info token then the Harpy token, then point to the player marked '2nd'. Put the player marked 'Mad' to sleep.
name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or both might die.

firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.
name: Lil' Monsta
ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]
